title: NMU Hosts Brain-Computer Interfaces Workshop (Northern Michigan University)
text: ( Source : Northern Michigan University ) A free workshop on the current and future applications of non-invasive and invasive Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCIs) will be offered on Friday, Oct. 23, by Northern Michigan University's psychology
